Name: Compressor - Capacity: Small medical quality air supply - Equipment that is either hard anchored or is vibration isolated with seismic snubbers/restraints - Combined anchorage/isolator & equipment fragility

GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: User to provide median demand and dispersion values.  The values listed are default PACT values and do not represent the response of this component.

DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair anchorage and concrete pad and remount equipment.

DamageStates.Description: Anchorage failure & Equipment damaged beyond repair.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace equipment including attached utilities in addition to repairing anchorage and concrete pad.

DamageStates.Description: Motor damaged but anchorage is OK.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Repair Motor - Anchorage and Concrete  do not require repair.

DamageStates.Description: Equipment damaged beyond repair but anchorage is OK.
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace and install equipment including new anchorage if anchorage is post-installed.
